    • Uses of GameException in missing.ui.canvas

      Methods in missing.ui.canvas that throw GameException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Movable HandPanel.removeSelectedItem()
      Selected item must be stored within the player's pocket, otherwise it throws a game exception.
      void HandPanel.transferBagToPocket()
      When the button is clicked, if there is a clicked item selected, it transfers it from the current Players Bag to the Pocket.
      void HandPanel.transferPocketToBag()
      When the button is clicked, if there is a clicked item selected, it transfers it from the current Players Pocket to the Bag.
      void HandPanel.useItem()
      Whenever the "USE" button is pressed, it uses the item to help benefit the player.
